QuestionText: What is the primary goal of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) in treating mental health disorders?
OptionA: To identify and change negative thought patterns
OptionB: To prescribe medication for symptom management
OptionC: To focus on past traumatic experiences

QuestionText: Which of the following is a common symptom of depression?
OptionB: Loss of interest in daily activities
